text.code: const eventType = variables['96afa935-1bd0-4117-bacc-f046056501e4']?.eventType; switch(eventType) { case 'bom_updated': return 'BOM Updated'; case 'component_added': return 'Component Added'; case 'component_removed': return 'Component Removed'; case 'stocktake_completed': return 'Stocktake Completed'; case 'order_status_changed': return 'Order Status Changed'; case 'user_login': return 'User Login'; case 'settings_changed': return 'Settings Changed'; default: return eventType || 'Unknown Event'; }

const eventType = context.item.data?.eventType; switch(eventType) { case 'bom_updated': return 'BOM Updated'; case 'component_added': return 'Component Added'; case 'component_removed': return 'Component Removed'; case 'stocktake_completed': return 'Stocktake Completed'; case 'order_status_changed': return 'Order Status Changed'; case 'user_login': return 'User Login'; case 'settings_changed': return 'Settings Changed'; default: return eventType || 'Unknown'; }
const message = context.item.data?.message || ''; return message.length > 80 ? message.substring(0, 80) + '...' : message
